detail_desc: Hi-tops with a hook and loop tab at the top and elasticated lacing at the front. Mesh insoles and fluted soles.
Joggers in stretch cotton twill with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and a decorative back pocket. Tapered legs with shaping seams at the knees and ribbed hems.
Court shoes in satin with a sheen. Round toes, an ankle strap with an adjustable fastening, imitation leather linings and insoles and rubber soles. Covered heels approx. 5.5 cm.
Hoodie in soft, printed sweatshirt fabric. Jersey-lined, wrapover hood, ribbed cuffs and a straight-cut hem. Soft brushed inside.
Straight-cut shirt in a soft, patterned viscose weave with a collar and buttons down the front. Long sleeves with narrow, buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem.

Studio Collection. Trousers in a slightly stretchy weave made from a wool blend. Regular waist with belt loops and a tailored waistband with a safety button on the inside. Zip fly with concealed hook-and-eye fasteners, side pockets and jetted back pockets with a button. Straight fit and extra-long legs with creases. Studio Collection AW20 is a tribute to the rebellious, fearless individual who dares to break the mould – an individual who plays between the extremes and finds their style amongst the androgynous, eclectic and creative.
Hooded top in soft sweatshirt fabric with a print motif on the front, dropped shoulders, long sleeves with ribbed cuffs, and a drawstring at the hem. Soft brushed inside.

Sleeveless, calf-length dress in a patterned viscose weave with a small stand-up collar and V-shaped opening at the front. Smocking at the top, buttons down the front and a flared skirt. Lined with a V-neck underdress with narrow shoulder straps. The polyester content of the underdress is recycled.
Short, fitted dress in stretch jersey with short sleeves.
Joggers in soft sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and a back pocket. Low crotch and tapered legs with decorative stitching at the knees and ribbed hems.
Top in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
V-neck jersey nursing top with a wrapover front, concealed press-stud at the top and long sleeves. Practical inner top for ease of nursing access.
Top in lightweight, printed sweatshirt fabric with dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Short, wide dress in woven fabric with a V-neck, buttons down the front, long sleeves and narrow, buttoned cuffs. Gathered seam at the waist and hem. Unlined.
Spacious wash bag in soft mesh with a zip at the top and an inner compartment with a hook and loop fastening. Lined. Size 9.5x17x23 cm.
Short-sleeved top in soft jersey with a motif and a rounded hem. Longer at the back.
Bikini top with a frill trim that continues up over the shoulders, a wrapover front with long straps that tie at the back and adjustable shoulder straps. Lined.

Set with a sleeveless dress and pair of puff pants in a cotton weave. Dress with broderie anglaise and a flounced trim at the front that continues back over the shoulders. Buttons at the back, a seam at the waist and a flared skirt. Lined. Puff pants with elastication at the waist and hems.
Straight-cut dress in woven fabric with an opening and button at the back of the neck and short sleeves with a wide flounce. Unlined.

Set with a top, pair of leggings and a hairband in soft cotton. Longer top in sweatshirt fabric with press-studs on one shoulder, dropped shoulders, long sleeves and a ribbed hem. Soft brushed inside. Leggings in soft jersey with an elasticated waist. Hairband in jersey with a knot detail at the front.
Dress in an airy cotton weave with flounce-trimmed shoulder straps and buttons down the front. Seam at the waist, narrow, covered elastication at the back and a gathered, flared skirt. Unlined.

Short romper suit in soft, patterned cotton jersey with a narrow trim around the neckline and gently dropped shoulders. Press-studs on one shoulder, concealed press-studs at the crotch and down the legs, and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
5-pocket, knee-length shorts in washed, superstretch denim with an adjustable, elasticated waist and zip fly and button.
Round-necked T-shirts in stretch cotton jersey.
Jumper in a soft, textured knit with long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Dress in patterned, stretch organic cotton jersey with a polo neck, long sleeves and a seam with decorative gathers at the waist. Unlined.
Fine-knit shaftless socks with a silicone trim around the heel to hold them in place.

Suit trousers in a stretch weave with a concealed hook-and-eye fastener and zip fly. Diagonal side pockets, jetted back pockets, and an adjustable tab with buttons at the sides. Skinny Fit – a fit with slightly shorter legs that is close-fitting at the thighs, knees and ankles to create a completely fitted silhouette.

Single-breasted jacket in a linen and cotton weave with narrow notch lapels and a decorative buttonhole. Welt chest pocket, flap front pockets and three inner pockets, one with a button. Fastening with two buttons at the front, decorative buttons at the cuffs, and a single back vent. Lined. Slim Fit – a fit that tapers at the chest and waist which, combined with slightly narrower sleeves, creates a fitted silhouette.
Top in sturdy, printed sweatshirt fabric with a lined drawstring hood, kangaroo pocket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Fully-lined, 5-pocket, slim-fit jeans in washed, stretch denim with an adjustable, elasticated waist, zip fly and button, and narrow hems.

Shirt in a soft linen and cotton blend with a button-down collar, classic front and yoke with a pleat at the back. Open chest pocket, long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs, and a rounded hem.

Ankle-length sports tights in fast-drying functional fabric. High waist with wide, elasticated ribbing. The tights are designed with the minimum number of seams for a more comfortable fit and increased mobility.
Running tights in fast-drying functional fabric with a brushed thermal inside. Regular waist with a concealed drawstring, an open pocket on one leg, and a zip at the hems. Reflective details.
Shorts in a cotton weave with an adjustable elasticated waist, zip fly and button, side pockets and a fake welt back pocket.

Sleeveless jumpsuit in soft, patterned viscose jersey with narrow, braided shoulder straps and a braided trim at the top. Double-layered top, an elasticated seam at the waist and tapered legs with cuffed hems.
Short top in sweatshirt fabric with a print motif on the front and a lined drawstring hood. Long sleeves with ribbed cuffs, and a raw-edge hem. Soft brushed inside.

Short blouse in a crêpe weave with a cut-out section at the front, an opening with a button at the back of the neck and long sleeves.Draped tie detail at the hem and elastication at the back of the hem.
5-pocket jeans in washed, stretch denim with hard-worn details, a regular waist, zip fly and button, and skinny legs.
Wide, high-waisted trousers in a cotton weave with a detachable tie belt, pleats at the top and a zip fly with a concealed hook-and-eye fastener. Low crotch, side pockets and wide, straight legs.

Straight-cut blouse in silk with a sheen. Opening and a covered button at the back of the neck and a decorative seam front and back. Slits in the sides and long sleeves with a fit that can be adjusted using the button at the cuffs.
Round-necked T-shirt in soft cotton jersey.
Straight-cut, off-the-shoulder blouse in an airy viscose weave with elastication and a small frill at the top, and wide 3/4-length raglan sleeves with a frill trim.
Ballet pumps with a bow at the front, elastic strap over the foot and a loop at the back. Fabric linings and insoles and rubber soles.
Vest top in airy Tencel™ lyocell jersey with a low neckline front and back.

Basics set in soft, organic cotton jersey comprising two vest tops, two T-shirts and a pair of leggings. Vest tops with narrow shoulder straps. T-shirts with a rounded hem that is longer at the back. Leggings with an elasticated waist.
Short-sleeved polo shirt in organic cotton jersey with a ribbed collar and button placket.
Tops in soft cotton jersey with a print motif, long sleeves and narrow ribbing around the neckline.

Super push-up bra in microfibre with underwired, thickly padded cups to maximise the bust and create a fuller cleavage, Adjustable shoulder straps, a wide hook-and-eye fastening at the back and elasticated ribbing at the hem. Designed with the minimum number of seams for a seamless, comfortable feel against the skin.
Classic T-shirt in soft, printed cotton jersey with a narrow trim around the neckline.
Dress in soft, patterned viscose jersey with narrow shoulder straps and a narrow elasticated seam at the waist. Gently bell-shaped skirt with an asymmetric hem.
Short dress in sweatshirt fabric with a print motif on the front, lined drawstring hood, kangaroo pocket, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Suit trousers in a stretch weave with a regular waist, zip fly and concealed hook-and-eye fastening. Side pockets and tapered legs with creases.
Fine-knit jumper in a soft, gently draping cashmere blend with long raglan sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Jumper in a soft, fine cotton knit with long raglan sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.

CONSCIOUS EXCLUSIVE. Flared, knee-length skirt in tulle made from RENU™ polyester with decorative grosgrain horizontal trims. Regular waist with a grosgrain waistband and concealed zip in one side with a hook-and-eye fastening. Gathers at the top and two extra layers of tulle for width and stability. Chiffon lining made from recycled polyester. RENU™ polyester is a high-quality polyester made from raw material recycled from used textiles.
Ankle boots in imitation suede with a foldover edge in faux fur at the top and a decorative grosgrain bow at the back. Faux fur linings and insoles and fluted rubber soles.
Bucket hat in woven fabric with eyelets at the sides and a cotton lining.

Padded all-in-one suit in wind- and waterproof, breathable functional fabric with closed seams, a detachable lined hood with a detachable faux fur trim and a zip and wind flap with a hook and loop fastening and chin guard at the front. Chest pocket with a flap and press-stud, front pockets with a waterproof zip, an adjustable elasticated waist and elastication at the cuffs and hems. Reinforced legs and back, reinforced elastic strap under the feet and reflective details. The suit has a water-repellent coating without fluorocarbons.

Sports armband with a touchscreen window for smartphones, adjustable hook and loop fastening and earphone outlet at the top and bottom. Silicone trim on the back to hold the armband in place. Fits smartphones up to 7x14 cm in size.
Jumper in a textured-knit cotton blend with a chest pocket, long sleeves and roll edges.
Short dress in a softly draping viscose weave. Opening with a covered button at the back of the neck, an elasticated seam at the waist and 3/4-length sleeves with a slit at the cuffs. Unlined.
Tops in soft cotton jersey with a print motif, long sleeves and narrow ribbing around the neckline.
Adjustable elastic braces with metal fasteners and imitation leather details.
Soft, fully lined, non-wired bra in stretch silk with narrow, adjustable shoulder straps and one hook-and-eye fastener at the back.
Sleeveless bodysuits in soft organic cotton jersey with press-studs at the crotch.
Double-layered hats in soft cotton jersey.

Oversized jacket in sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend with a lined drawstring hood, zip down the front and large front pockets. Low dropped shoulders, ribbed cuffs and a seam with wide ribbing at the hem. Soft brushed inside.

Short, fitted dress in a stretch weave with a V-neck opening at the front, cap sleeves, and a seam and detachable fabric belt with a covered buckle at the waist. Concealed zip down the back and a slit at the back of the hem. Unlined.
Soft, non-wired bra in lace with padded cups for a larger bust and fuller cleavage. Adjustable shoulder straps, a hook-and-eye fastening at the back and a wide lace trim at the hem.
Blouse in a viscose weave with a collar and buttons down the front. Yoke at the back, a tie-front hem and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs.
Sleeveless, round-necked top in jersey crêpe with pleats front and back and an opening with a button at the top.
Ankle-length trousers in soft, supple leather with a high waist, zip fly and button, front and back pockets and straight legs with seams at the knees.
Maxi dress in soft, printed organic cotton jersey in a narrow cut at the top with narrow shoulder straps. Smocked seam at the waist and a skirt that is longer at the back. Unlined.
Long-sleeved top in soft sweatshirt fabric with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Sunglasses with plastic frames and UV-protective, tinted lenses.
Fancy dress costume in velour and jersey with a glitter print. High, lightly padded collar at the back, long sleeves with asymmetric cuffs and a seam at the waist with a flared, lined tulle skirt.

Long-sleeved jumper in a soft knit containing some wool. Zip at the back, dropped shoulders, ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem, and slits in the sides. The polyester content of the jumper is recycled.
Trainers in mesh with imitation leather details, lacing at the front and a loop at the back. Mesh linings and insoles and chunky rubber soles.
Joggers in jersey with a slight sheen. Elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets, a back pocket and tapered legs with ribbed hems. Brushed inside.
